## QueryFilter.set() method

Set the value of a filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(name: string, value: unknown): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of the field. |
|  value | <code>unknown</code> | Value of the filter. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

Setting the value of a filter will replace any existing value.
